enunciado: Calcule o limite de $\lim_{x 	o \infty }(\sqrt{x^4+x^2} + \sqrt{x^2+5x} - x² - x)$:
justificativa:
$\lim_{x 	o \infty }(\sqrt{x^4+x^2} + \sqrt{x^2+5x} - x^2 - x) 
ewline= \lim_{x 	o \infty }(\sqrt{x^4+x^2} - x^2) + \lim_{x 	o \infty }(\sqrt{x^2+5x} - x) 
ewline=\lim_{x 	o \infty }[(\sqrt{x^4+x^2} - x^2) rac{(\sqrt{x^4+x^2} + x^2)}{(\sqrt{x^4+x^2} + x^2)}] + \lim_{x 	o \infty }[(\sqrt{x^2+5x} - x) rac{(\sqrt{x^2+5x} + x)}{(\sqrt{x^2+5x} + x)}] 
ewline= \lim_{x 	o \infty }( rac{x^2}{\sqrt{x^4+x^2} + x^2}) + \lim_{x 	o \infty }( rac{5x}{\sqrt{x^2+5x} + x}) = \lim_{x 	o \infty }[ rac{x^2}{x^2( rac{\sqrt{x^4+x^2}}{x^2} + 1)}] + \lim_{x 	o \infty }[ rac{5x}{x( rac{\sqrt{x^2+5x}}{x} + 1)}]
ewline= \lim_{x 	o \infty }( rac{1}{ rac{\sqrt{x^4+x^2}}{x^2} + 1}) + \lim_{x 	o \infty }( rac{5}{ rac{\sqrt{x^2+5x}}{x} + 1})
ewline=\lim_{x 	o \infty }[ rac{1}{ rac{\sqrt{x^4(1+ rac{1}{x^2})}}{x^2} + 1}] + \lim_{x 	o \infty }[ rac{5}{ rac{\sqrt{x^2(1+ rac{5}{x})}}{x} + 1}]
ewline=\lim_{x 	o \infty }[ rac{1}{ rac{x^2\sqrt{1+ rac{1}{x^2}}}{x^2} + 1}] + \lim_{x 	o \infty }[ rac{5}{ rac{x\sqrt{1+ rac{5}{x}}}{x} + 1}]
ewline=\lim_{x 	o \infty }( rac{1}{\sqrt{1+ rac{1}{x^2}} + 1}) + \lim_{x 	o \infty }( rac{5}{\sqrt{1+ rac{5}{x}} + 1})
ewline= rac{1}{\sqrt{1+0} + 1} +  rac{5}{\sqrt{1+0} + 1}
ewline= rac{1}{\sqrt{1} + 1} +  rac{5}{\sqrt{1} + 1}
ewline= rac{1}{2} +  rac{5}{2} = 3$
